special_abilities.name: Fearsome Presence.
special_abilities.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin’s Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4–6).
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
special_abilities.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Longbow. Ranged Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

reactions.name: Parry.
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
